name: shiori-sh
title: Shiori
description: Search, save, and manage your Shiori bookmarks. Mark links as read, delete them, save from clipboard, and track unread count in the menu bar.
author: 0xdhrv

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: API Key
preferences.description: Your Shiori API key (starts with shk_). Get one at shiori.sh → Settings → API.

commands.name: search-links
commands.title: Search Links
commands.description: Browse, filter, and manage your saved Shiori links

commands.name: save-link
commands.title: Save Link
commands.description: Save a URL to your Shiori library

commands.name: save-tab
commands.title: Save Current Tab
commands.description: Save the currently open browser tab to Shiori

commands.name: menu-bar
commands.title: Unread Links
commands.description: Show unread Shiori link count in the menu bar

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
